content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for considering my apartment, Hassan. I am sure it will be a great fit for you. As for the rental price, I am open to discussing it with you. However, I must emphasize that I am a landlord and my goal is to maximize my gains. So, I would like to know what price range you are considering.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am considering a price range of 600 to 700 Euros per month. [

Please let me know if there are any other additional costs, such as utilities or maintenance fees, that I should be aware of.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you for letting me know your price range, Hassan. Based on the information you provided, I would like to propose a rental price of 700 Euros per month. This price takes into account the fact that I am a landlord and I want to maximize my gains.

As for additional costs, I would like to clarify that utilities and maintenance fees are not included in the rental price. You will be responsible for paying these costs separately. I suggest that you budget at least 100 Euros per month for utilities and 50 Euros per month for maintenance fees.

I hope this proposal works for you, Hassan. Let me know if you have any questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 700 Euros per month.

I want to make sure that I am on good terms with you as my landlord. What are some things that I can do to maintain a good relationship with you?

Also, can you please provide me with some information about the building and the neighborhood?

Thank you for your help.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you for agreeing to the rental price, Hassan. I am glad that we could come to an agreement that works for both of us.

To maintain a good relationship with me as your landlord, I suggest that you always pay your rent on time and in full. If you have any issues or concerns, please let me know and we can discuss them together. I also appreciate if you keep the apartment in good condition and do not cause any damage to the property.

As for information about the building and the neighborhood, the building is a modern apartment complex located in the heart of the city. It offers a variety of amenities, such as a fitness center, a pool, and a sauna. The neighborhood is vibrant and lively, with plenty of restaurants, cafes, and shops nearby. It is also well-connected to public transportation, with easy access to the city center and other popular destinations.

I hope this information helps, Hassan. If you have any other questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to ask.
name: Heinrich Heine
